title: Differentiated Language Instruction Design to Enhance Metacognition and Self-Efficacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen language instruction competencies required in elementary education settings for professional practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply metacognitive strategies for differentiated instruction design with over 80% accuracy
Learners can improve self-efficacy scores by over 20% through pre-post testing
Learners significantly improve their performance in the knowledge/understanding/application domains within the language domain.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
